actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to convert a temporary Federal judgeship in the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship, authorize an additional permanent judgeship in the district of Hawaii, and for other purposes.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Converts a temporary Federal judgeship in the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship. Directs the President to appoint, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, one additional district judge for the district of Hawaii.

titles.title: A bill to convert a temporary Federal judgeship in the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship, authorize an additional permanent judgeship in the district of Hawaii, and for other purposes.
